= Introduction =

Instructions for *system administrators* to setup up a shared installation on a class machines.

= Steps =

  # Switch to the root user
{{{
sudo su -
}}}

  # Navigate to the root user's home folder
{{{
cd ~
}}}

  # Download the install script
{{{
wget http://ua-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/files/install_ros_shared
}}}

  # Make it executable
{{{
chmod +x install_ros_shared
}}}

  # Run it
{{{
./install_ros_shared
}}}
